reviewText: This dvd is good.  My 2-year-old loves Barney, so they are all great to him.  I actually really enjoy watching them with him. We enjoyed it and will continue to.

This is a cute Barney movie with lots of Christmas songs!  My 2 year old daughter truly enjoys it!  Hannah is the lovable, wholesome star of this movie and I think she is a great role model for kids.  The other kids are also great.  Every time my daughter watches, she dances along with the cast.
Movie was at my door in just a couple of day!  My 14 month old just loves this movie... Just a fun fact... Snowflake the elf also plays Baby Bop!
Very cute Barney Christmas DVD.  It features tons of Christmas songs and decorations perfect for getting kids in the holiday mood!  Features Barney and his friends, and wholesome lessons for kids!
My wife, grandchildren love this video. It gets the loving and giving sprit alive all year.
My niece loves it!
My grandchildren really enjoy this movie.
Excellent
Same as always
grand kids loved this DVD
2 yr old loves it.
I DID NOT get this dvd & its suppose to be a Christmas gift
thank you!
Thought it was animated.
my grandson will love it
So so. Passed on to library. Not a keeper.
The Barney voice is not the one I'm used to and it drives me nuts!
Very cute and fun. My 3  Year old loves it.

You can imagine my surprise when I put the DVD in and it was in Spanish. I thought I must have mis ordered the wrong one but actually this description clearly says English. I'll have to return it which is a pity because it's for my niece whom I'm seeing out of town tomorrow.

i
 ordered this for my special needs daughter only to find it would not play in europe,
I didn't know we purchased this.  I think my son might have with his Fire tablet...
Excellent video.  Nephew loves Barney the purple dinosaur!
LOVE IT.
Our Great Grandaugher loves Barney and watches it for hours.
So fun for little ones

I'm glad there's a Christmas Barney out there especially this time of the season, but my 18 month nephew only likes the songs (meaning back to back songs, no story lines). Thus, it did not keep his attention long enough.
Very happy 3 year old.

Received this dvd for my little girl and it was so scratched that we can't watch more then 5 minutes of it before having to fast forward to the next scene. Very disappointed it looks like a very cute episode, too bad we can't watch the whole thing.

My kids love Barney, this pink dinosaur will never get old.
Just wonderful.
This movie was ok...thought there would be more Christmas songs - etc...so was a little disappointed for me - but my 2 year old Granddaughter LOVES IT!
Am excited for Christmas!  The Kids have the songs memorized!
Great Christmas movie with Barney! My one year old loves it.
Once again, Barney makes my kids happy. This one and Halloween party are decent even for adults.

Its okay, but not as exciting and captivating as I expected based on previous Barney experience. The pictures are very clear.
Again, the regional play format should be expanded to play in most regions.
My daughter loves Barney but unfortunately Barney is no longer "hot".  So the DVDs are difficult to find.  Great item - great price.  Thank you.
very nice movie
Arrived on time and my son loves it!
who doesn't love B
My granddaughter love's this movie and I love the the fact that every Barney movie teachers children about such things as the importance of family sharing safety.
A wonderful character for a 3 year old. Also not so bad for a 53 year old either...  We could all use a little reinforcement of what is kind, and gentle and caring...
My 2-year old daughter LOVES this movie!  The sing-a-long bonus feature is also quite wonderful!
these Barney Video;s are for my autistic granddaughter who responds to them with happiness.
This is my son's favorite Barney show! They sing all of the typical children's holiday songs and it has him singing them all year round.
My kids love it barney
kids love it
good music and visuals. my daughter, who has special needs, loves it! Makes her want to dance!  thank you its a good movie
We find this so entertaining for us as well as for our grand children!!!  We dance and sing right along with Barney and his friends!
My kids live this Barney movie. It's a combination of several other Barney Christmas episodes and songs. Great holiday fun for kids

What more can be said? If your family loves Barney, you can stand listening to the same songs repeated in each story. Grand daughter loves this. We watch it from December 1 - January 1 and hide it for the rest of the year.
This one is a Standard Barney. This Christmas special is cute but nothing exceptional or "special". As the parent, okay the initial watch.
Good children's movie.  My grandson enjoyed watching the movie over and over.  Very entertaining.  The songs are catchy and easy to remember.

This is of course one of the favorites of my son.  He does not have a large amount of likes unless it includes Barney, Wiggles or KidsSongs.  My son is a 10 yrs old disabled  angel and he only wants to watch what he likes.  But that is what everyone likes to do.  I was saddened to hear that Barney retired.

Barney was a positive influence on my daughters and nieces when they were growing up.  This was one of their favorite Christmas videos.  I purchased this story on DVD so we could recreate that Barney Christmas "magic."  Watching this DVD at Christmas will be our new family tradition.
It was sweet, caring, loving and great music, My granddaughter and I love Barney!!!  Merry Christmas and Happy New Year!
My grandsons have loved Barney and this is another great Barney. This one is for my great grandson -another Barney fan like his father.
My daughter absolutely loves this movie, she had it last year and it broke. So glad I was able to replace!!
Thanks for having this on prime. I have had Netflix and they got rid of all the shows my daughter loved. So I am grateful to have these here.

I am glad you had this to purchase. It is so hard to find valuable TV programming and this is GREAT. We allow our child to watch Barney only during breakfast and lunch to assist in limiting TV exposure. Hard to find quality programming these days.
These are great movies. I love that my son loves them to. He wanted this certain barney tape and was so pleased to find it out on line. The price and shipping were great.
As much as I want to dislike Barney, my 3 year old loves it, and it does promote good values like honesty and loyalty.
LOVE this I love it more than the kiddos lol it's been one of my favs since the kids first watched it years ago and just fell in love plus I'm a Christmas nut to lol hope everyone enjoys it like I do
My house hold loves Barney so we all watch Barney regardless of age and usually eat popcorn as a treat to enjoy th holiday

Bought this movie for our 18 month old granddaughter.  She really enjoys watching it.
She loves to watch Barney on TV.
loved it
Great price...love this DVD!
